Name: Permiakov Aleksei
Text: I am 26 years old, learning JavaScript frontend. The level of English is at the elementary level. I decided to change my main activity to IT, because. interested in the prospects of this direction and the opportunity to develop without restrictions. I hope to find a job with a close-knit team and people who will help me gain new knowledge and skills. At the moment I am studying under the guidance of a mentor, I am fulfilling the tasks assigned by him.
